summary: Dr. Darrell E. Lewis, M.D., was initially disciplined for unprofessional conduct and drug-related allegations, resulting in a reprimand and license suspension. He later violated his consent order by testing positive for an illicit substance while participating in a rehabilitation program. The Maryland State Board of Physicians issued a final order, reprimanding him and suspending his medical license for a minimum of one year, with reinstatement contingent upon successful completion of the Maryland Professional Rehabilitation Program.
